channel.title: Apprenticeship on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Apprenticeship on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Dwarves Foundation Apprenticeship Batch Of 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It’s our second attempt rolling out this program. But the motivation stays the same: Accelerating someone’s current software development skillset.

item.title: Df Apprenticeship 2022 Meet The Mentors Ngoc Thanh Pham
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: [DF APPRENTICESHIP 2022 - MEET THE MENTORS] Dwarves Team is shifting our focus to blockchain technology. We offer study groups and blockchain-based projects for peeps to grow and catch up with this rising trend.

item.title: Df Apprenticeship 2022 Meet The Mentors Tuan Dao
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Tuan Dao - Senior Frontend/ Blockchain Engineer Tuan has 4+ years of experience under his belt, 2 out of those 4+ was spent at Dwarves Foundation.
